title: Ineos Grenadiers in Reboot: Geraint Thomas Leads Team Into Post-Pidcock Era at Tour Down Under
content:
Ineos Grenadiers has been turned upside down by a management restructure and Pidcock's departure. Can Thomas set the tone into a transitional 2025?

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers in Reboot: Geraint Thomas Leads Team Into Post-Pidcock Era at Tour Down Under on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
